BEFORE you proceed to the Next Unit, have you fulfilled these objectives? 
Prepare electrical tools for specific task.
Request appropriate electrical supplies, materials and tools applicable to a specific job.
Receive and inspect electrical supplies, materials and tools.

BEFORE you proceed to the Next Unit, have you fulfilled these objectives? 

 > Identify basic concepts and principles of Electricity
 > Describe important concepts and principle of Electricity
 > Demonstrate understanding about the fundamentals of Electricity

BEFORE you proceed to the Next Unit, have you fulfilled these objectives? 
 >Select appropriate electrical measuring tools and instruments.
 > Describe the mensuration and calculation appropriate to apply in a specific job.
 > Carry out measurement and calculations for specific job.

BEFORE you proceed to the Next Unit, have you fulfilled these objectives? 

 > Analyze signs, electrical symbols and data.
 > Interpret technical drawings and plans.
 > Create plans and diagrams for specific job.

BEFORE you proceed to the Next Unit, have you fulfilled these objectives? 

 > Check condition of Tools and Equipment
> Perform Basic Maintenance
 > Store Tools and Equipment

BEFORE you proceed to the Next Unit, have you fulfilled these objectives? 
 > Identify hazards and risks
 > Control hazards and risks
 > Practice Occupational Health and Safety Procedure.
